New Records: Glenn Maxwell broke the record for the fastest T20I century on Australian soil, scoring 120 from 55 balls.
Maxwell also equalled Rohit Sharma with five T20I centuries.
Key Match Events: Maxwell's unbeaten 120 was a dominant performance, turning the game in Australia's favor.
The West Indies struggled in their chase, losing five wickets early, allowing Australia to win by 34 runs.
Australia's victory gave them an unassailable 2-0 lead in the best-of-three series.
Post-Match Reflections: Maxwell highlighted the importance of seizing scoring opportunities in T20 cricket.
The series win marked a significant achievement for Australia in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of a best-of-three series.
Other Australian players like Tim David, Mitchell Marsh, and David Warner contributed significantly to the win.
